item.title: Discriminant Analysis
item.description: Linear and Quadratic Discriminant Analysis. Applications of LDA (classification, dimensionality reduction) and differences with PCA. Application of QDA.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: Train-Test Split Evaluation
item.description:
Summary. Train-test split procedure. Cross-validation: K-folds, leave-p-out, leave-one-out.

import numpy as np

Train-Test Split General Procedure

The train-test split is a technique for evaluating the performance of a machine learning algorithm, used for supervised learning algorithms.

Learning the parameters of a prediction function and testing it on the same data …
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: Random Forests
item.description: Definition of Random Forest. Implementation from scratch. Application on classification and regression tasks. Choosing of optimum number of trees.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: Decision Trees
item.description: Definition. General steps. Decision tree classifier implementation from scratch. Application of classifier and regressor. Definition of pruning.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: Hierarchical Clustering
item.description: Definition. Steps. From-Scrath Python implementation. Application on data sets of different shapes. Comparison with k-Means.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: Feature Scaling
item.description: Definition. Explanation and implementation of min-max normalization, mean normalization, and standardization. Application to data set.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: k-Means
item.description: Definition. Assumptions. Steps. From-Scrath Python implementation. Application on dummy data.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: Logistic Regression
item.description: Definition of Logistic Regression. Demonstration and explanation of cost function. Optimization with Gradient Descent. From-scratch implementation in Python. Application on dummy data.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: k-Nearest Neighbors
item.description: Definition. Assumptions. Finding of optimum k with K-folds Cross-validation. Testing of different distance metrics, including Euclidean, Manhattan and Cosine. Application and analysis on Iris dataset.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: Central Limit Theorem and Normality Test
item.description: Application of Normality Test to normal-like distributions. Explanation of the Central Limit Theorem, and verification with Normality Test for different combinations of sums of uniform, exponential, and normal samples of different sizes.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: Confidence Intervals and Bootstrapping
item.description: Explanation of Confidence Intervals, Bootstrapping, and comparison.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: Collaborative Filtering
item.description: Definition. Data Preparation. Application of Collaborative Filtering with Stochastic Mini-Batch Gradient Descent, L2 Regularization and Cross-validation, using Python.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: Gradient Descent
item.description: Explanation and implementation of Gradient Descent. Application on benchmark functions. Evaluation with RMSE.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: Principal Component Analysis
item.description: Theoretical explanation of PCA, including Geometric, Covariance, and SVD approaches. From-scratch Python implementation. Application to real dataset. Why PCA should not be used for clustering.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: Singular Value Decomposition
item.description: Theoretical explanation of the SVD. From-scratch Python implementation. Application example on an image.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: Metropolis-Hastings Algorithm
item.description: Explanation and Implementation of MCMC algorithm Metropolis-Hastings.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: Simulated Annealing
item.description: Theoretical framework of the algorithm, including annealing schedules, and acceptance probability function. Implementation and application over benchmark functions. Evaluation with RMSE.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: Monte Carlo Methods
item.description: Includes three applications of the Monte Carlo Methods: Integration, Pi Approximation, and Custom Distribution Sampling.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: Canonical Genetic Algorithm
item.description: Application of Canonical Genetic Algorithm in a function maximization problem.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: M/M/1 Queue Simulation
item.description: Simulation of a MM1 Queue and analysis of average delay in queue, average customers in queue, server busy proportion, and total time it takes for n users to get service.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: Roulette Simulation: Strategies Analysis
item.description: Simulation of Martingale, d'Alembert and All-in Strategies in a Casino Roulette, for which the capital flow is analyzed.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual

item.title: Roulette Simulation: Statistical Analysis
item.description: Simulation of a Casino Roulette, for which the mean and variance are analyzed, and empirical demonstration of the Law of Great Numbers.
item.dc:creator: Gastón Amengual
